info.description:
Red Dot is XY, updated every frame if LMB is down.
Green dot is ZW, updated only on the first frame LMB is clicked.
Blue rectangles represent the signs of each channel. 
  XY+ always. 
  Z+ if LMB held. 
  W+ if LMB clicked this frame.
